survey_name: Public Library Digital Resource Usage Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand how patrons utilize digital resources provided by public libraries to improve service offerings and user experience.

questions.question_text: How often do you access digital resources (e-books, audiobooks, online journals, etc.) from your public library?
questions.client_notes: Use a frequency scale to gauge engagement levels. Ensure options cover all potential usage patterns.
